actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System by designating the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail, and for other purposes.
short_title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail Act

summary.text: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act of 1968 to include the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail, extending from Nogales, Arizona, to San Francisco, California, as a part of the System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail Act
A bill to amend the National Trails System by designating the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail, and for other purposes.
